name: I hate Heroes
description:
In this game, you will suit as an Awesome Evil character.

But one day some heroes ruined your day while you were happily pooping. So you decided to go around the world and kill every heroes you find on your path.

Instructions:

The game is a rail Game so the player will move himself.

Grip button: Charge/Release the shield as a boomerang

Trigger: Release the sword

Secondary button: Open Shield.

Asset Used:

Alien Planet Pack:  Alien Planet Pack | 3D Sci-Fi | Unity Asset Store

Dreamteck Splines: Dreamteck Splines | Utilities Tools | Unity Asset Store

POLYGON Fantasy Chracters:  POLYGON Fantasy Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty | Characters | Unity Asset Store

Polygon Arsenal: Polygon Arsenal | VFX Particles | Unity Asset Store

Grim Reaper Wraith: Grim Reaper Wraith Evolution Pack Cute Series | 3D Creatures | Unity Asset Store
